name: Lorna Dane
text: Geomagnetic Link — Action: Shuffle up to 2 [[magnetic]] cards from your discard pile into your deck. For each card shuffled this way, heal 1 damage from Lorna Dane. (Limit once per round.) “Complicated. It's my brand.”

name: Polaris
text: Electromagnetism Manipulation — Action: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for up to 2 [[magnetic]] cards and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.) “I am a big gun. Or have you forgotten?”

name: Havok
text: Response: After Havok attacks, put each copy of Magnetized Debris in your discard pile on top of your deck (limit once per phase). "... this is what I have been most afraid of, ever since I first manifested my powers - using it to kill."

name: Disarmament
text: Hero Action: Choose: • Remove 2 threat from a scheme • Discard an attached copy of Magnetized Debris from an enemy → discard an attachment with the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response" from that enemy.

name: Electromagnetic Pulse
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. This attack gains overkill. You may discard X attached copies of Magnetized Debris from among enemies → this attack deals 2X additional damage. If none were discarded this way, confuse an enemy.

name: Forcefield Exoskeleton
text: Hero Action: Choose: • Ready and heal 1 damage from an ally. • Discard X attached copies of Magnetized Debris from among enemies → give X friendly characters a tough status card. "Little electromagnetic shield for us..." -Polaris

name: Hold it Together
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 4 threat from a scheme. You may discard X attached copies of Magnetized Debris from among enemies → remove X additional threat from that scheme. "Spoiler alert: I struggle with this. A lot." -Polaris

name: Magnetized Debris
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If you overpaid for this card with a [energy] resource, this attack gains piercing and deals 1 additional damage. If that enemy is defeated by this attack, shuffle this card into your deck. Otherwise, attach this card facedown to that enemy.

name: Opposites Attract
text: Hero Action: Choose a player. Deal 2 damage to the villain and each enemy engaged with that player. For each enemy damaged this way, you may discard an attached copy of Magetized Debris from that enemy to stun it.

name: Boneyard
text: Interrupt: When a Magnetized Debris would be shuffled from your discard pile into your deck, attach it facedown under here instead. Hero Interrupt: When Polaris would take any amount of damage from an attack, shuffle a card under here into your deck → prevent 2 of that damage.

name: Magnetic Levitation
text: Polaris gains the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Response: After you play a Magnetized Debris, exhaust this card → ready Polaris. "Well, clever is my middle name." -Polaris

name: Mistress of Magnetism
text: Magnetized Debris gains "This attack gains ranged." Hero Resource: Exhaust this card → generate a [energy] resource. you may discard X attached copies of Magnetized Debris from among enemies to generate X additional [energy] resource.

name: Wrapped in Metal
text: Attach to an enemy. Reduce the cost to play this card by 1 for each copy of Magnetized Debris attached to the target. Forced Interrupt: When the attached enemy would activate, discard this card instead.

name: Magnetic Poles
text: Team-Up (Magneto and Polaris). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Search your deck for a [[magnetic]] card and add it to your hand. Remove this card from the game.
